title: What to Expect From AT&T’s Next Earnings Report
text:
AT&T has had an eventful third quarter. An activist investor knocking on its front door, a leadership shakeup, and unlimited wireless plan price cuts at rival Verizon Communications have kept management busy.

Despite all the external and internal noise, shares climbed almost 15% in the third quarter, extending AT&T’s (ticker: T) 2019 return to 37%, including dividends. That’s double the S&P 500’s 18% return this year and quadruple Verizon’s (VZ) 9%. One analyst sees AT&T’s businesses delivering a solid third-quarter...
description: Shares climbed almost 15% in the third quarter, extending AT&T’s 2019 return to 37%, including dividends.
